articles.title: 'Being Submissive Can Be Harmful...": Dhanashree Verma's Cryptic Post Has Internet Talking About Yuz.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Yuzvendra Chahal was not named in Team India's squad for the Asia Cup 2023
articles.content: The announcement of Team India's squad for the upcoming Asia Cup came as yet another disappointment for Yuzvendra Chahal as the veteran leg-spinner got overlooked once again. The 33-year-old spinner … [+2755 chars]
